definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Please return the form, duly completed and signed, to our Public Office.
sentences.chinese: 請於填妥及簽署表格後將其交回卓佳投資者服務處。

sentences.english: A big investor is very displeased.
sentences.chinese: 一位大投資者則非常不滿。

sentences.english: In the first part, the author explain the meaning of medium-small investor.
sentences.chinese: 論文第一章首先闡述了投資者和中小投資者的內涵。

sentences.english: In the first part, the author explain the meaning of medium-small investor.
sentences.chinese: 論文第一章首先闡述了投資者和中小投資者的內涵。

sentences.english: This was key to managing the investors and opening more pockets of finance.
sentences.chinese: 這就是管理投資者和打開更多金主腰包的關鍵。

sentences.english: Some investors even raked in up to 40 percent in profits.
sentences.chinese: 一些投資者甚至迅速賺得高達40%的利潤。

sentences.english: China has a big stake in Myanmar.It is the country’s leading foreign investor. Myitsone is one of manyhydropower, mining and infrastructure projects there.
sentences.chinese: 中國在緬甸擁有重大利益，是該國重要的外國投資者。

sentences.english: Nordvig. 'Somebody new is selling now, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，現在有新的投資者在拋售了。

sentences.english: Weston now demanded all profits from these sales go entirely to the investors.
sentences.chinese: 威斯頓如今卻要求所有銷售的利潤均歸投資者。

sentences.english: I had two strategics in my first company.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一個公司擁有過兩個戰略投資者。

sentences.english: An investor-friendly package is paramount to funding.
sentences.chinese: 對投資者有利的方案是極爲重要的資金。
但黃金投資者記恨這個。

sentences.english: Do investors not like the company?
sentences.chinese: 難道投資者看不上這家公司？

sentences.english: Ssangyong says it is in the initial stages of talks with potential strategic investors.
sentences.chinese: 雙龍稱，正與潛在戰略投資者進行初期談判。

sentences.english: They need to have a high rate of interest in order to pull in money from investors.
sentences.chinese: 要吸引投資者進行投資，他們需要有高利率。

sentences.english: But private investors may have been durably scared by the union's display of clout.
sentences.chinese: 但是私人投資者受到工會的這政治上的強烈恐嚇。
